description: This file contains unit tests for the JwtService class, specifically testing token generation and parsing functionalities within the authentication backend.

classes.name: JwtServiceTest
classes.description: Test class for JwtService, verifying token creation and parsing functionalities.

methods.name: generateAndParseToken
methods.description: Test method that verifies the creation of a JWT token and its subsequent parsing to claims, ensuring the correctness of both processes.
